definition: to reduce/to lessen (pain etc)/to deduct (from taxes)
to lower/to decrease/to reduce/to subtract/to diminish
to get rid of/to remove/to exclude/to eliminate/to wipe out/to divide/except/not including

sentences.english: Avoid carrying unneeded items in the trunk.
sentences.chinese: 減除行李廂內不必要的物品。

definition: (of a political career) everything is going smoothly (idiom)
to think for oneself and act accordingly (idiom); to act on one's own initiative
my limited view (lit. view through a thin tube)/my limited understanding/my opinion (humble)
to make a profit/to gain/to get an advantage
lit. a cup of water on a burning cart of firewood (idiom); fig. an utterly inadequate measure
to impair/to degrade/to decrease/to reduce/to weaken/to detract from/impairment (e.g. of financial assets)
